TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but self assembly is required and fuel and batteries are not included.

I wish to think of a wish quicker.

Granted. The Communist Fairy decided the only way this is possible is to stuff an extra soul inside of you.

You're stuck with two half-souls constantly fighting over your body, since not even Communist Fairy can fit two souls in.

I wish that my video games played themselves when I'm not playing them.

Granted, but they suck at it. big time.

I wish for 64-bit support in KSP (Im looking at you Unity!)

Granted. After technological advances (that nobody but Squad and Unity have), their bit system is so epic. They ONLY support 8192-bit.

I wish I knew what the benefits of 8192-bit computers were.

Granted. But you have to use Linux to get it. Edit: Was aimed at the 64-bit request.

I wish more drivers were courteous.

Granted, but now the pedestrians are such big d*ckholes that Hitler looks like a saint

I wish that i could Space Boost (Check Tyranicon's Youtube Series, Space Scumbag)

Granted, but you tear a hole in space and time.

I wish we knew 100% about how many alien civilisations there are and where they are, as well as how to get to them fast.

Granted. There are none.

I wish electric cars were more affordable.

Granted. They're cool literally, but not cool enough socially. Also, electric cars are one thirtieth as efficient as the least efficient non-electric, and slower than snails.

I wish for docking ports & rope.

Granted, but the ports have a crash resistance of 0.3m/s, and the rope is actually poorly made twine.

I wish for my wish to be horribly corrupted.

Granted. Your wish is horribly corrupted. So it is not corrupted. So it is%$th48( [DEBUG CONSOLE: KERNEL PANIC, REBOOTING]

Oh, hello there.

I wish the present was as good as my nostalgic memories of the past.

Granted. But the nostalgic memories of the past are strange and you are stuck in endless nostalgia.

I wish i had some ice cream now.

Granted. It's an ice slime from Terraria, except it's cream instead of water.

You get devoured horribly.

I wish for a pet pseudoplant.

I have no idea what is is, i give you a pedoplant instead.

I wish for Orange Kitties everywhere.

Granted, But the kitties are violent.

I wish for a Space station for everyone on this forum!

Granted. Everyone has to climb into a three-man station.

I wish for [REDACTED]

Hell No.

I wish for a Space Station for everyone on the forum. AND It's a 180000 man station.

Granted. The space station gets picked up by the Deep Space Kraken, and is thrown into intergalactic space.

Everyone gets killed when the DSK picks them up.

I wish deep space was safer than a rock in a rock museum.

Hell No.

I wish for a Space Station for everyone on the forum. AND It's a 180000 man station.

Granted. Everyone now has their own 180000 man station to themselves. Unfortunately, they are on all suborbital trajectories going at 4000 m/s. At that speed, I estimate the energy output to be about 1025 joules, or 10 times the amount of energy that strikes the earth each year or 100 times more than the energy of the Chicxulub Crater. Humanity is entirely wiped out.

I wish that I could fly.

EDIT: Granted. Rock museums are now the most dangerous places for rocks.

Granted. You can now fly airplanes, but you're terrible at it. Your aviation license is revoked.

I wish TheDarkStar corrupted the wish I posted before his post. (corrupt this)

Edited May 26, 2014 by Tery215

Granted, but it isn't granted, and the resulting paradox causes you to try and teach the Space Sphere to walk.

I wish for Crusader Kings 3.

Granted! It is released early and is buggy as hell.

I wish for KSP Multiplayer.

Granted, but only you play it.

I wish for my wish to be granted.

Granted. You now have one less wish.

I wish that Icarus_Vice was real.

Granted. I'm Freddy Kruger.

I wish for somebody to click the link in by signature.
